metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5330 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
ldb before 1.1.24, as used in the AD LDAP server in Samba 4.x before4.1.22, 4.2.x before 4.2.7, and 4.3.x before 4.3.3, mishandles stringlengths, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information fromdaemon heap memory by sending crafted packets and then reading (1) an errormessage or (2) a database value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5330` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss-winbind - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
libpam-smbpass - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
libpam-winbind - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
libparse-pidl-perl - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
libsmbclient - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
libsmbsharemodes0 - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
libwbclient0 - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
python-samba - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
registry-tools - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
samba - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
samba-common - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
samba-common-bin - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
samba-libs - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
samba-testsuite - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
smbclient - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
winbind - 2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

ldb-tools - 1:1.1.16-1ubuntu0.1
libldb1 - 1:1.1.16-1ubuntu0.1
python-ldb - 1:1.1.16-1ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: samba package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.1.6+dfsg-1ubuntu2.14.04.11').
ldb package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.1.16-1ubuntu0.1').
